/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the road, reflecting the city's dynamic rhythm. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
